name: Nest Egg Income
body:
![Nest Egg Picture](http://www.paulnewell.biz/images/RVC-NestEgg-120x120.png)
### The Nest Egg Income App
* Remembers fixed monthly income
* Calculates monthly interest income
* Calculates monthly dividend income
* Calculates total monthly investment income
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
